<properties pageTitle="41b9f504-ccbf-4bf1-ae43-a58fb4e25e47" description="626b494c-55df-4210-9c8a-3ec4d492477a" services="virtual-machines" documentationCenter="" authors="dlepow" manager="timlt" editor="" tags="azure-service-management"/>
<tags ms.service="virtual-machines" ms.devlang="multiple" ms.topic="article" ms.tgt_pltfrm="vm-linux" ms.workload="infrastructure-services" ms.date="08/03/2015" ms.author="danlep"/>

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block:
Description=HelloWorld After=docker.service Requires=docker.service
[Service]
TimeoutStartSec=0 ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker kill busybox1 ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker rm busybox1 ExecStartPre=/usr/bin/docker pull busybox ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker run --name busybox1 busybox /bin/sh -c "while true; do echo Hello World; sleep 1; done" ExecStop=/usr/bin/docker stop busybox1

fleetctl --tunnel coreos-cluster.cloudapp.net:22 start helloworld.service
Unit helloworld.service launched on 62f0f66e.../100.79.86.62

fleetctl --tunnel coreos-cloudapp.cluster.net:22 journal helloworld.service
Mar 04 21:29:26 node-1 docker[57876]: Hello World Mar 04 21:29:27 node-1 docker[57876]: Hello World Mar 04 21:29:28 node-1 docker[57876]: Hello World Mar 04 21:29:29 node-1 docker[57876]: Hello World Mar 04 21:29:30 node-1 docker[57876]: Hello World Mar 04 21:29:31 node-1 docker[57876]: Hello World Mar 04 21:29:32 node-1 docker[57876]: Hello World Mar 04 21:29:33 node-1 docker[57876]: Hello World Mar 04 21:29:34 node-1 docker[57876]: Hello World Mar 04 21:29:35 node-1 docker[57876]: Hello World
fleetctl --tunnel coreos-cluster.cloudapp.net:22 stop helloworld.service fleetctl --tunnel coreos-cluster.cloudapp.net:22 unload helloworld.service

Description=High Availability Apache After=docker.service Requires=docker.service
[Service] TimeoutStartSec=0 ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker kill apache1 ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker rm apache1 ExecStartPre=/usr/bin/docker pull coreos/apache ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker run -rm --name apache1 -p 80:80 coreos/apache /usr/sbin/apache2ctl -D FOREGROUND ExecStop=/usr/bin/docker stop apache1
[X-Fleet] X-Conflicts=apache@*.service

fleetctl --tunnel coreos-cluster.cloudapp.net:22 start apache@{1,2,3}.service
unit apache@3.service launched on 00c927e4.../100.79.62.16 unit apache@1.\service launched on 62f0f66e.../100.79.86.62 unit apache@2.service launched on df85f2d1.../100.78.126.15
\<html>\<body\>\<h1\>It works!\</h1\> \<p\>This is the default web page for this server.\</p\> \<p\>The web server software is running but no content has been added, yet.\</p\> \</body\>\</html\>
fleetctl --tunnel coreos-cluster.cloudapp.net:22 stop apache@{1,2,3}.service fleetctl --tunnel coreos-cluster.cloudapp.net:22 unload apache@{1,2,3}.service

MarkdownLinkedReference.link_id: how to use coreos on azure
linux and open-source computing on azure
